impact_summary: Unexpected power failure in the data center affecting B2B communication with some external systems.
raw_text:
Subject: Outage Notification – Unexpected power failure in data center
From: BlueRoute Express <support@bluerouteexpress.com>
To: B2B Operations <b2bops@yourorg.com>
Date: 2025-10-10 02:23 IST

Dear Partner,

Please be informed that we are currently experiencing a Unexpected power failure in data center affecting B2B communication with some of our external systems. Our technical teams are actively investigating the cause.

Outage Start Time: 2025-10-10 02:23 IST
Estimated Resolution: Under investigation

We will notify you once services are fully restored.

Kind regards,
BlueRoute Express Technical Operations Team
